attributes.action: exclude the canary Islands and balearic Islands from Quarantine.
attributes.additional_details: the save the livelihood of thoses in the travel tourism industries which we not only effect airlines and tour operators but worldwide travel for years to come, they must be aware that millions of people save all year round. have only limited holidays and peoples lives abroad rely souly on trade with tourists as they don't have the same opportunities afforded to them for state benefits.
attributes.background: we want the giver to actually listen to the local governments of the canaries and balearics and remove the travel restrictions save thousands if jobs both here and abroad.
